short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 视频素材抓取与管理工具

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can capture all video materials from the current browser, download them, and manage the currently playing materials, such as playback speed, screenshots, volume adjustments, etc. Additional downloaders, M3U8 parser, MPD parser, JSON formatting, etc. are also provided. It is also possible to perform regular matching and masking on the material during use
